description: Consists of 3 bedrooms (3 en suites), kitchen, dining and living room, separate lounge, courtyard and a large garden with swimming pool.
Highly finished 3 bedroom apartment is on the market from our vast range of apartments for sale in Malta. Located in the heart of Gzira few minutes away from the seafront.
Set on a staggering 13,000m2 of land, this property is nothing short of what most would consider the ideal dream house for the architectural connoisseur.
A commercial property in Malta, located in Valletta. The office covers an area of 500sqm over five floors. It is brand new and finished to very high standards. With a good sized roof terrace.
Luxury and furnished 2 bedroom apartment is on the market from our range of properties for sale in Malta. Surrounded by all amenities and walking distance to the Sliema sea front.
